body.name: URTRY Phone Tripod, 49'' Magnetic Selfie Stick for iPhone with Remote, Extendable Phone Tripod Stand for All Cell Phones, Detachable Wireless Remote, Portable Phone Tripod for Selfie/Photo/Live/Vlog
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 45 mins
features: 【New Generation Magnetic Suction Bracket】This selfie stick features next-gen magnetic design, compatible with iPhone 12/13/14/15 series. Just a gentle touch and your phone securely locks in place, making it convenient and swift.For other devices, the silicone clamp ensures a reliable grip, suitable for smartphones ranging from 4 to 7 inches. (❤️Other phones can also enjoy magnetic functionality through the included magnetic ring)

【Aerospace-Grade Aluminum Alloy】This phone tripod stand is crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy, ensuring long-lasting durability, Say goodbye to unreliable tripods or selfie sticks.This tripod for cell phone also provides unprecedented stability and precision, allowing you to capture unbelievably professional-grade photos and videos.

【Expandable and Rotatable Design】This cell phone tripod expands up to 49 inches for all your usage needs. The phone can rotate 360 degrees, supporting both horizontal and vertical shooting. The bracket is adjustable up to 180 degrees, suitable for different shooting scenarios, ensuring beautiful photos.

【Detachable Wireless Remote】This phone tripod with remote don't need app. You can control your phone's camera functions within 33 feet (10 meters), eliminating the need to stretch and touch the phone's shutter button. Achieve professional-quality selfies effortlessly! With its detachable design, after use, it easily installs onto the bracket, preventing any chances of loss. It's equipped with a built-in 55mAh rechargeable battery, charged through the micro USB charging port.

【Compact and Portable】This cell phone tripod can fold down to 9 inches, easily fitting into your bag, ready to capture beautiful moments anytime, anywhere. No matter when or where, this selfie stick is your reliable companion for on-the-go photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stable and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Its easy to connect through your phone via bluetooth and no hassle It is stable to use either using it as a tripod or a selfie stick.it is convenient taking videos and photos especially when you are ij vacation. This helps me a lot, would recommend,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great to take videos for tik tok or just a selfie 🤳 it comes with a remote to capture picture or video, works either by magnet or without as it has 2 peices from the sides to hold phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: It extends pretty far and it's so sturdy! A must for me.You stuck the round magnet to the back of your phone (it looks pretty) and then magnetize it to the stick.The only downside is that u have to take the phone case off to use it because the case is thick and it doesn't work with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product pics show you just about everything you can do with this selfie stick. It extends pretty far but it's a bit stiff to open and close, which is good for sturdiness. It comes with a metal ring to stick onto the back of your phone in order to utilize the magnet on the stick. Of course if you have one of those pop-up do-dads on the back of your phone that enables you to hold it more securely, this selfie stick is not for you. I have a metal ring on the back of my phone and I have a magnet kick stand loop thingy that allows me to hold the phone in my hand more securely. I can also just take it off whenever I want. That's why I chose this selfie stick, because I already have the metal ring and I can pull off the kick stand to attach my phone to the stick.The material this is buil;t out of is said to be some aluminum alloy but it feels like plastic. It has a remote button which is probably one of the best features and it's rechargeable. The remote really free one up to be able to start and stop recording at will without loosing one's position. Depending on how you edit or don't edit, the remote is great.There are little arms that widen to hold your phone securely. They barely fit my phone. If phones get bigger again, this selfie stick will be obsolete unless you're comfortable with just the magnet. If your doing physical action types of recording the magnet alone may be enough but I have not tested it. I don't trust a magnet all that much but that's just me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Modern selfie stick it can be tripod it has good stand and portable remote control to connect bluetooth also comes with magnet ring if ur phone don't stick with it and use cable to charge remote control

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing masgsafe tripod
reviews.reviewText: Amazing magsafe tripod compatible with magsafe cases. I love that it can be folded and fit in a bag. The phone holder can rotate 360 degrees. The magnet function is so strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Only received the extension pole
reviews.reviewText: Only one part was in the box. There was no damage, but the tripod legs and remote were completely missing. My granddaughter likes the rod and as you can see in the second picture, she props it up on a chair to use it similar to a tripod. It grips the phone well and holds it tight. We are simply disappointed the entire item as pictured did not arrive.
